name: Cute Pets’ Designer-Dressup For Animal
description:
Cute Pets’ Designer is a lovely pets fashion salon game.
You may have seen a lot of fashion model show,but you may never seen the pets fashion show.It is very special.Here,you are the manager of these lovely pets.Your job is to make sure they are health,and you have to help them to take bath.Now join Cute Pets’ Designer!

Game Features:
- Fun-filled pets caring game
- Kinds of animals is available for you to choose
- Pets salon,hair washing and dressup
- Well-designed game scense and background music
- Fun-filled game levels
